product_name: Rossignol Fun Girl J3 Ski Boots - Girls' - 2013/2014
long_description: With lightweight shells that are easy for young skiers to flex, the Rossignol Fun Girl J3 girls' ski boots offer a comfortable fit for young skiers developing their skills. Anatomic inner boots conform to the shape of kids' feet, ensuring all-day comfort. Bi-injected polyolefin shells are lightweight and easy to transport. Liners use anatomic, molded foam to increase warmth and comfort. Flex index of 40 is an easy flex appropriate for junior skiers. Rossignol Fun Girl J3 ski boots are offered in Mondo sizes 20.5 - 22.5, which correspond to US kids' sizes 2 - 4.5; Mondo sizing is a standardized ski industry sizing system. Boots feature 3 buckles and a low cuff height for younger kids with shorter legs.
short_description: With lightweight shells that are easy for young skiers to flex, the Rossignol Fun Girl J3 girls' ski boots offer a comfortable fit for young skiers developing their skills.
